resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75836</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75836</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>9e49b35c-7806-4d4f-a0f3-6a8e9a97e5fa#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A szén körforgása a társulásban</string>
            <string language="en">Carbon's circulation in the association</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zirkulation des Carbons in der Verbindung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La circulation du carbone dans l'association</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circulação do carbono na associação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circolazione del carbonio nell'associazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυκλοφορία άνθρακα στην ένωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circulación del carbón en la asociación</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szénvegyületek (szén-dioxid, szerves anyagok) útja egy életközösségben az egyes táplálkozási szinteken (termelők, fogyasztók, lebontók).</string>
            <string language="en">Carbon compounds' (carbon dioxide, organic matters) path in a community on single alimentary levels (growers, consumers, decomposers).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">anyagforgalom,  anyagok körforgása,  ökoszisztéma,  nyílt rendszer,  </string>
            <string language="en">trade in materials, circulation of matters, ecosystem, open system</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Carbon setzte (Kohlendioxyd, organische Stoffe) 
Pfad in einer Gemeinschaft auf einzelnen nährenden Stufen zusammen 
(Züchter, Verbraucher, decomposers).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le carbone a composé (anhydride carbonique, 
sujets organiques) la voie d'accès dans une communauté aux niveaux 
alimentaires simples (cultivateurs, consommateurs, decomposers).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O carbono combinou (dióxido de carbono, 
matérias orgânicas) o trajeto em uma comunidade em únicos níveis 
alimentary (growers, consumidores, decomposers).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il carbonio ha composto (anidride carbonica, 
argomenti organici) il percorso in una Comunità ai singoli livelli 
alimentari (coltivatori, consumatori, decomposers).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονοπάτι των ενώσεων άνθρακα (διοξείδιο του άνθρακα, 
οργανικές ουσίες) σε μια κοινότητα στα ενιαία διατροφικά επίπεδα
(καλλιεργητές, καταναλωτές, decomposers).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El carbón compuso (bióxido de carbono, las 
materias orgánicas) el camino en una comunidad en los solos niveles 
alimenticios (cultivadores, consumidores, decomposers).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">handeln Sie in den Materialien, Zirkulation der Stoffe, 
Oekosystem, geöffnetes System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commercez en matériaux, circulation des sujets, écosystème, 
système ouvert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">negocíe nos materiais, circulação das matérias, ecosystem, 
sistema aberto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">commerci in materiali, la circolazione degli argomenti, 
l'ecosistema, sistema aperto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εμπόριο στα υλικά, κυκλοφορία των θεμάτων, οικοσύστημα, 
ανοικτό σύστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">negocie en los materiales, circulación de materias, ecosistema,
sistema abierto</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75836</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
